content.description:
Area that has been left a bit for dead these past few years.  It`s remote, it`s wild, it`s a great way to disconnect. 
 Probably best to plan a multi-day trip with a bunch of friends and enjoy the tent  platforms near the cliffs. 
  
 A lot of the work done in the area are thanks to Jean-Philippe Henri, Dominic Asselin and many more. 
  
 The FQME is planning to have their yearly late summer event (Festiroc 2015) there so hopefully wilderness will be tamed a bit, trails cleared etc. 
  
 Take a look at the park's website for more info: 
  parcsregionaux.org/parcs-re… 
  
 Topo map of the climbing area
